title: Historic Grandeur in the Italian Lakes
description: Soak up the exquisite beauty of the Italian lakes staying at Villa Porro Pirelli, a historic manor dating back to the sixteenth century and set in a centuries-old park. Located in the countryside just ten minutes from the city of Varese and an hour from Milan, itâ€™s the perfect launchpad for discovering the lakes of Northern Italy. Your stay includes daily breakfast, an indulgent three-course dining experience with a glass of wine each and a bottle of prosecco and fresh fruit in your room on arrival.
offer_address: Via Tabacchi, 20, 21056 Induno Olona VA, Italy
